seodesc: ZincObserve is a cloud-based observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. It utilizes a unique approach to data storage and indexing, which stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, resulting in upto 140 times lower storage costs.

heroSection.title: ZincObserve
heroSection.subtitle: Observe Everything. Bare metal, VMs, Containers, AWS, GCP, Azure, Kubernetes, Serverless.

details.title: Logs, Metrics, Traces
details.desc: Zincobserve is an observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. ZincObserve stores data in s3/gcs/minio/zure blob to achieve low cost data storage (~140x lower storage cost than Elasticsearch). It's stateless nodes architecture allows for extremely easly scaling. The advanced GUI for logs, metrics and traces coupled with dashboards allows you to not manage multiple systems for a different kinds of observability data (Think prometheus for metrics, Elasticsearch for logs, Jaeger for traces, grafana for dashboards). It supports SQL as primary query language, which means you do not have to learn yet another query language. PromQL is also support for querying metrics data. Inbuilt alerting mechanism allows you to send alerts to any platform (slack, teams, etc.). It is built in rust for high performance and memory safety.
details.desc1: A single unified platform for logs, metrics and traces that you can get started with in under 2 minutes. It can be deployed on-prem or in the cloud. It is built in rust for high performance and safety.

content.title: ZincObserve Features
content.subtitle: Discover the Game-Changing Features of ZincObserve:

items.title: Full-stack observability Solution
items.desc: Observe everything. Front end, back end, microservices written in any language.

items.title: 140x Lower Storage Costs
items.desc: ZincObserve leverages a unique approach to data storage and indexing that eschews reliance on indexing altogether. Instead, it stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, utilizing local disk or object storage in parquet columnar format. This strategy minimizes the compute requirements during data ingestion and results in highly efficient compression rates, translating into approximately upto 140 times lower storage costs.

items.title: Dynamic Schema Evolution
items.desc: You do not need to worry about schema changes. ZincObserve supports dynamic schema evolution, which allows you to ingest logs without worrying about schema of the logs.

items.title: Accelerate performance
items.desc: SIMD support and columnar storage format enables ZincObserve to deliver high performance. This is available both on x86 and ARM processors.

items.title: Comprehensive alerting mechanisms
items.desc: With scheduled and real-time alerts, you can stay on top of critical problems as they happen. This means that you can quickly address any issues and keep your systems running smoothly.  Additionally, it offers template-based alert targeting, enabling users to dispatch alerts seamlessly to multiple platforms such as Slack and Teams, among others. This feature enhances the user's system monitoring capabilities, enabling them to proactively track and manage their system's health.

items.title: Advanced Data Analysis
items.desc: With ZincObserve, dashboards can display data from logs, metrics, and traces, providing a complete picture of system behavior. They provide a visual representation of real-time data, allowing users to quickly understand the health and performance of their systems.

features.title: ZincObserve Features
features.subtitle: Explore the transformative functionalities of ZincObserve and experience a new level of data observation

items.title: SQL based query language
items.desc: Utilize what you already know. Nothing new to learn here.

items.title: Alerts
items.desc: Provides scheduled and real-time alerts that allow users to promptly address critical issues and dispatch alerts to multiple platforms using templates, which improves system monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Dashboards
items.desc: Dashboards provide a comprehensive view of system behavior by presenting real-time data from logs, metrics, and traces in a visually appealing and efficient manner.

items.title: Data Storage in Obect Store
items.desc: Provides Storage functionality support in local Disk, s3, MinIO, GCS resulting in 140x lower storage cost.

items.title: Dynamic Schema Evolution
items.desc: Supports dynamic schema evolution that allows for seamless modification of data schemas without downtime.

items.title: Security
items.desc: Provides out of the box authentication methods to secure access to the platform.

items.title: Advanced GUI
items.desc: Provides a user-friendly and intuitive graphical user interface for easier navigation and use of the platform.

items.title: User defined Ingest & Query functions
items.desc: Offers efficient data analysis by transforming large datasets into valuable insights while enabling users to customize ingestion and querying functions using the Lua scripting language.

items.title: Localization
items.desc: Supports 10+ popular languages for the UI.

faqData.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqData.subtitle: Everything you need to know so you can use ZincObserve as a FastSearch.
